job_title: Java backend Developer with Strong MongoDB & AWS Exp
jd: From: Harsh, Tanisha Systems Inc harish@tanishasystems.com Reply to: harish@tanishasystems.com Hi,Please send me resume if interested in below role. Hands on with version control practices, Continuous Integration tools e.g. JenkinsKnowledge of cloud technologies – AWS, GoogleUnderstanding of relational databases e.g. Oracle, MS Sql ServerExposure to Agile based software development Following MongoDB specific capabilities:Designing and customizing MongoDB applicationsImplementing database updates and migrationDebugging and troubleshooting when issues ariseAnalyzing databases and advising on optimizing performanceUnderstanding of back-up and disaster recovery plansGood to have knowledge of big data platforms e.g., Cassandra, Hadoop, Mark logic etc. Regards Harish kumarLead Recruiter, Tanisha Systems IncEmail: harish@tanishasystems.com Website: www.tanishasystems.com Address:99 Wood Ave South Suite # 308,Iselin, NJ 08830LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/harish-kumar-71907714b/
